Name: the Word Of Blake
Description: The Word of Blake is an extremist faction of ComStar that originated from a backlash against the removal of that organization's mystical and religious aspects. Initially persecuted by their secular foes, the Blakists took refuge in the Free Worlds League before seizing control of Terra and moving their operations there. The dissolution of the Second Star League saw the Word of Blake proclaim a <i>Jihad</>, or religious crusade seeking to reunify the Inner Sphere under their control.
ReputationStatements: Even ComStar occasionally requires the services of mercenaries, Commander. We will look highly upon you, should you aid us.

MissionSuccessStatements: The Word of Blake congratulates you on your successful mission, mercenary. We are pleased you've been able to assist us so thoroughly.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: It seems apparent that while you failed to achieve our goals, you engaged the enemy for as long as you were able. Better luck next time, Commander. May the Spirit of Blake be with you.
BadFaithFailureStatements: Far be it from a simple organization like ComStar to reprimand you in matters of warfare, Commander, but… your performance on that operation was positively abysmal. We roundly condemn your inadequacies.
